response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment that could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate, while also maximizing the return on my investment.
